# MySqlRowsCopiedEventHandler delegate

Represents the method that handles the [`MySqlRowsCopied`](../MySqlBulkCopy/MySqlRowsCopied/) event of a [`MySqlBulkCopy`](../MySqlBulkCopyType/).

```csharp
public delegate void MySqlRowsCopiedEventHandler(object sender, MySqlRowsCopiedEventArgs e);
```
